citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility did not have a documented environment enhancement plan to promote the psychological well-being of their
avian species as required by the Animal Welfare Act.
The licensee must develop, document, and follow a species-appropriate plan for environmental enhancement adequate to
promote the psychological well-being of birds. The plan must be approved by the attending veterinarian and must
correspond with currently accepted professional standards. The plan, at a minimum, must address social grouping,
environmental enrichment, special considerations, restraint devices, and requirements for exemptions.
Correct by August 31, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility did not have a documented environment enhancement plan to promote the psychological well-being of their 
avian species as required by the Animal Welfare Act.  
 
The licensee must develop, document, and follow a species-appropriate plan for environmental enhancement adequate to 
promote the psychological well-being of birds. The plan must be approved by the attending veterinarian and must 
correspond with currently accepted professional standards. The plan, at a minimum, must address social grouping, 
environmental enrichment, special considerations, restraint devices, and requirements for exemptions. 
 
Correct by August 31, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
